name: Pop to Save
description:
Pop to Save is mobile puzzle game based on particle physics, line drawing and erasing. With this compatible combination you will experience a different gameplay through our unique game. Physical interaction at games is an entertaining factor itself, adding puzzle solving challenges multiplies the fun. This game is also enriched with 4 different packages including different gameplays already.

Pop to Save has its fascinating story with cute little characters. It is ready with 4 different packages and 96 levels. All level-packs have different style of gameplay. The fourth one is on the road. Our goal is to design unique playing experience with each new level.

FEATURES

• Amazing particle physics
• Adorable character
• Story-based gameplays
• Brain-teasing puzzles
• 4 different packages, 96 original levels
• Physics objects, portals, lasers, pre-drawn lines, multi-spawners and many more featured game objects
• 6 supported languages (English, French, German, Italian, Spanish, Turkish)
